column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday January 5 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: I-75S at 68 MM in Rockcastle Co:
column4: The center and left lanes are blocked as emergency crews continue working the scene of an overturned semi.

column3: I-75S at 68 MM in Rockcastle Co:
column4: Motorists may detour using Berea/Exit 76 to Hwy 21 to US-25S to Exit 62/Mt Vernon.  Expect long delays.
The ferry is back open on a regular schedule.  It has been closed due to high water conditions.
